name: Practical Translation: French - English
description: This full-year course, which works as an introduction to translation, is designed to improve studentsâ€™ mastery of French through English to French and French to English translations. Emphasis is on the practice of translation of a variety of texts and documents, and on the introduction to the practice of oral interpretation from one language to the other.
prerequisites: 1.0 FCE in FSL at the 300-level, or any 1.0 FCE in FRE at the 200-level.
